advent.text: Our King and Savior now draws near: * O come, let us adore him.

all_saints.text: all saints' and other major saints' days
The Lord is glorious in his saints: *
O come, let us adore him.

ascension.text: Alleluia. Christ the Lord has ascended into heaven: *
O come, let us adore him. Alleluia.

christmas.text: Alleluia, to us a child is born: *
O come, let us adore him. Alleluia.

easter.text: Alleluia. The Lord is risen indeed: *
O come, let us adore him. Alleluia.

epiphany.text: epiphany, and the feast of the transfiguration
The Lord has shown forth his glory: *
O come, let us adore him.

lent.text: The Lord is full of compassion and mercy: *
O come, let us adore him.

pentecost.text: Alleluia. The Spirit of the Lord renews the face of the earth: *
O come, let us adore him. Alleluia.

presentation.text: The Word was made flesh and dwelt among us: *
O come, let us adore him.

trinity.text: Father, Son, and Holy Spirit, one God: *
O come, let us adore him.
